input_prompt: User: Can you reschedule my booking for Conference Hall 101 from 10 AM to 2 PM tomorrow?
expected_output: Agent: Let me check the availability for Conference Hall 101 at 2 PM tomorrow.

input_prompt: User: Book Conference Hall 101 in Central Block for 10 AM to 12 PM tomorrow.
expected_output: Agent: Your booking for Conference Hall 101 in Central Block from 10 AM to 12 PM tomorrow has been confirmed.

input_prompt: User: Can I book a conference hall for tomorrow?
expected_output: Agent: Got it. Conference Hall 101, Central Block, tomorrow 10-12. Booking placed.

input_prompt: show me available sports venue on Friday
expected_output: Agent: To help you, please provide football ground, indoor stadium from 9 to 5.

input_prompt: User: Can you reschedule my meeting room to 3 PM?
expected_output: Agent: Sure, so you mean the one you booked for today at 1 PM?

input_prompt: User: I need to reserve a space for an event.
expected_output: Agent: Which campus and block would you like to reserve the space in?

input_prompt: User: I would like to schedule a meeting at 3 PM.
expected_output: Agent: Great! I have noted the meeting at 3 PM. Is there anything else you would like to add?
